name: 2ECONDS TO STΔRLIVHT: Forever My Diamond (itch)
description:
As graduation looms, true feelings begin to surface. Will Grace find the courage to overcome her shyness and bare her heart to Sera, or will her handsome rival Akira get to her first?

A free VN about being really gay for your best friend. A standalone entry in the NOISZ series, and prequel to NOISZ STΔRLIVHT - made in collaboration between SKY HOUR WORKS and Anarch Entertainment!
